titles: The Reward of loyalty being a song of the times, advising every man to be faithful to God, loyal to his King, and honest to his neighbour, and not to meddle with state affairs : to the tune of Hark the thundering cannons rore.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
keywords: James --  II, --  King of England, 1633-1701 --  Poetry.
